summary: A simple retexture of the guard shields for all holds
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/1020/W4e7mL.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=4]Current Version:[/size][/color] [b][color=#c27ba0][size=5]1.2[/size][/color][/b][/center]
[size=4][center][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url][/center][/size]
[b][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]---Description---[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]This is a simple retexture of all the different guard shield throughout the game. The textures are available in 4K, 2K and 1K. All textures are scratch made by me.Â [/size]

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4][b]---Compatibility---[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]This mod IS NOT compatible with any other mods that changes the shields.
[/size]

[color=#6d9eeb][size=4][b]---Example---[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Here you may see an example with one of the shields: [url=https://skfb.ly/VrVB]Hjaalmarch Guard's Shield[/url]
[/size]
[/font]
author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Improved Guard Shield Textures - 1K - 1.2
files.changelogHtml:

Corrected Hjaalmarch shield
Tweaked base texture of the shield
